Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.reducedmodel

Class ReducedPersonalBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.reducedmodel.ReducedPersonalBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ReducedPersonalBoard
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
This class represents a simplified version of a PersonalBoard with respect to the server's class. It contains only the information required client side.
See Also:
